name: Zdenek Dvorák 0001
content: Homepage of Zdenek Dvorak Home My CV Publications Teaching/Výuka Graph Minors Book Contact Zdeněk Dvořák Professor at Computer Science Institute of Charles University, Prague. Married Iva Plešingerová and lives happily ever after. Wrote a book on Graph Minors. Research interests: graph coloring structural graph theory algorithms and complexity Current hobbies: hiking, Shinto Muso Ryu Jodo, reading sci-fi and fantasy.
